SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.model.abstractEntities

Interface MemberActions

All Known Implementing Classes:
Dad, Daughter, Granny, HouseHoldMember, Mom, Pet, Son
public interface MemberActions
Defines the core actions that a household member must be able to perform related to event processing and simulation updates.

This interface outlines the API for member behavior within the simulation environment.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<Event>
    generateEvent()
    Attempts to generate a spontaneous new event based on the member's current state or random chance (e.g., deciding to use an appliance or do sport).
    void
    updateSimulationTick()
    Executes the necessary logic for the member during each simulation tick.

  • Method Details

    • updateSimulationTick

      void updateSimulationTick()
      Executes the necessary logic for the member during each simulation tick. This usually involves checking the to-do list and processing pending tasks.

    • generateEvent

      Optional<Event> generateEvent()
      Attempts to generate a spontaneous new event based on the member's current state or random chance (e.g., deciding to use an appliance or do sport).
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the generated event, or empty if no event is generated this tick.
